description: Pictures of the Irish PM, shirtless and apparently enjoying a picnic, were posted on social media.
title: Leo Varadkar defended over 'picnic in park' pictures
title_page: Leo Varadkar defended over 'picnic in park' pictures - BBC News
maintext: According to the statement, the taoiseach has been staying in Steward's Lodge during the last few weeks as it has secure office and video conferencing facilities, which allows him to work from home.
